text: Indonesia participated in the 1966 Asian Games held in Bangkok, Thailand from December 9, 1966 to December 20, 1966. It was ranked seventh in medal count, with five gold medals, five silver medals, and twelve bronze medals, for a total of twenty-two.1966 Asian Games medal tally ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !
